snippet.title: Sim Solver Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Deploy into Sim Solver and play as a debugging software with a bit of a twist! A handful of nasty viruses have corrupted a series of varied simulations which at one point allowed people to explore and live out their wildest fantasies in a number of settings and styles. Only now they have become death traps and filled up with glitches and hazardous code that you need to debug!

With the help of a companion, the program charged with running these simulations. You'll debug these viruses by solving puzzles, shooting your way through hostile code, platforming around any number of obstacles, and exploring areas for key items that take you deeper into the simulation!

Start your journey now and start solving this sim!

Out October 1st 2024
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3103230/Sim_Solver/

Special thanks to Justin Bell for the music
https://www.composerbell.com/


Special thanks to Dack for the help with the trailer
https://www.youtube.com/@UCBygknBshaX9LjQQ_qQH-0g
